description: Developing scalable backend architectures for digital banking systems.
achievements: Designed and implemented scalable backend services supporting high-volume financial transactions.
Improved system reliability and performance through better caching, async processing, and service optimization.
Contributed to the development of core banking features including bonds, mutual funds, sbn, and e-tax services.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to deliver secure, compliant, and production-ready solutions.
Maintained clean, well-documented codebases aligned with industry best practices and internal standards.

description: Led backend engineering efforts for multiple projects, focusing on scalability, reliability, and team efficiency.
achievements: Led successful delivery of multiple backend-driven projects from development through production.
Improved development velocity by introducing reusable modules and shared backend patterns.
Stabilized production systems by resolving critical issues and reducing recurring bugs.
Strengthened team execution by mentoring backend developers and improving collaboration practices.
Helped align technical decisions with business goals through close coordination with analysts and managers.

description: Contributed to the growth and stability of backend systems by improving reliability and supporting evolving product needs.
achievements: Helped improve system stability by identifying root causes of recurring issues and fixing them at the source.
Reduced future development friction by introducing reusable services and cleaner service boundaries.
Grew technical breadth by working across multiple languages and stacks in real production environments.

description: Built a strong engineering foundation through hands-on work on real-world backend systems and applications.
achievements: Played a key role in shipping backend features that supported active production systems.
Contributed to multiple live applications used by internal and external users.
Improved long-term maintainability by writing clean, structured code and refactoring legacy parts.
